summary: A father who was absent for 30 years of his son's life returns and wants to bond with his son, on a road trip to the north.
cast: Vesa-Matti Loiri|Samuli Edelmann|Leena Uotila|Eija Vilpas|Pertti Sveholm|Irina Pulkka|Krista Kosonen|Mari Perankoski|Peter Franzén|Eeva Litmanen|Amira Khalifa|Eila Roine|Jukka Virtanen|Emilia Sinisalo|Marja-Leena Kouki|Elina Knihtilä|Ada Kukkonen|Irina Björklund|Kristo Salminen|Minni Laakso|Aake Kalliala|Rea Mauranen|Eeva Salminen|Laura Airola|Mauri Kuokkanen|Riikka Lampinen|Emil Holmström|Tuure Kilpeläinen|Rocka Merilahti|Sampo Haapaniemi|Jarno T. Karjalainen|Aarne Riikonen|Jiri Kuronen|Leena Vanhamäki|Anssi Lindström
keywords: absent father|reunion|dysfunctional family|male objectification|two word title
title: Tie pohjoiseen
